content.webTitle: Shevchenko has to sit out warm-up win against Libya

fields.headline: Shevchenko has to sit out warm-up win against Libya
fields.bodyText: Ukraine stepped up their preparations with a 3-0 victory over Libya in the Swiss town of Gossau. Vladimir Yezerskiy headed the first from a 49th-minute corner and Oleksiy Byelik and Andriy Vorobey added two late goals. The captain Andriy Shevchenko, now with Chelsea, is recuperating from a knee injury he sustained last month and did not play, but he is expected to be fit for the opener against Spain next Wednesday.
